title: Council Decision of the European Union of 7 February 1994 adopting a full member and an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
header:
COUNCIL DECISION OF THE EUROPEAN UNION of 7 February 1994 adopting a full member and an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture (94/C 51/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Mr Michael O'CONNELL is hereby appointed a full member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture in place of Mr James LILLIS for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 19 June 1994.

Mr Tom SHERIDAN is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture in place of Mr Ian KEATING for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 19 June 1994.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 February 1994.
For the Council
The President
Th. PANGALOS
(1) OJ No L 223, 21. 8. 1985, p. 26.
(2) OJ No C 182, 13. 7. 1991, p. 1.
(3) OJ No C 245, 20. 9. 1991, p. 4.
